com.sailthru.client
Class SailthruClient

java.lang.Object
  com.sailthru.client.AbstractSailthruClient
      com.sailthru.client.SailthruClient

public class SailthruClient
extends AbstractSailthruClient

Main class exposing API calls for Sailthru API as per http://docs.sailthru.com/api

Author:
Prajwal Tuladhar
